message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I think you'll love it, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a great price considering its worth to you is $1200000, and I'm confident you'll see the value it brings.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me is $1200000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between our previous offers.
